author: Suzannah Lyons
title: Bats have lived with coronaviruses for thousands of years. What made this one jump?
description: It's clear this coronavirus came from wildlife, but we may never know the exact host species it directly jumped from into humans.
content:
Despite the conspiracy theories you're hearing, or the misinformation that's spreading on social media, it's clear that this coronavirus came from wildlife.
By looking at the genome of SARS-CoV-2 the virus that causes COVID-19 it is clear it has signatures t… [+7052 chars]
